fig.add_trace(go.Histogram(x=section_lengths, nbinsx=30, name='Section Lengths'))
fig.update_layout(
    title='Distribution of Section Lengths',
    xaxis_title='Section Length (Î¼m)',
    yaxis_title='Frequency'
